The ring is currently a 6 1/2 but can be sized to any size at additional cost. The setting and the band are both entirely made of 14k white gold. The diamond is a Transitional cut, popular in the 1930's, and has an H color, VS1 clarity. The center stone carat weight is .9 and with the accent diamonds is just above 1tcw.
